title: The CREATION'S CREATION
body_text:
November '08 Inaugural Event!
Pregame Battle Royal sets the 162nd Stage!
The deadly pregame
Battle Royal
opened things up at DODGEBALL 162, jump-starting what should be one intense November 2008. Contestants of this 9th free-for-all included some of the modern era's finest talent: Ryan Letsche, Jon Yochum, Justin Wolf, Alysha Kelly, Kevin Fitzpatrick, Melissa Kerr, Eamon Fitzpatrick, and eventual champion
John Tronolone
. The ultra-competitive, big time main eventer took out Fitzpatrick brothers Kevin and runner-up Eamon to secure his record-breaking fourth Battle Royal victory.
The win rewarded Tronolone the right to form rival teams to his liking - even going as far as allowing iconic catcher "Sputz" Krott to swap coalitions each round! Plus, with "The Creation's" critical mid-season showdown against legendary performer Ryan Letsche, you can bet your *ss these two only intensified their ongoing feud.
Flash Results by Game
Team WRESTLE: 1, 5, 6
Team MANIA: 2, 3, 4, 7
All-around, it was a fun-filled evening with a plethora of athletic displays and comedic happenings. What a great way to kick-off
ECD's
unprecedented fourth November!
The Rules
: Classic two-team match-up.
The Match
: Team MANIA defeated Team WRESTLE, 4 - 3.
Moments & Stars
: Justin Wolf angrily punting a bulletball into the tennis light pole; Jason Teitelbaum unintentionally smacking down a live bulletball eliminating himself in the process; Kevin Megill's obsession with hitting the rim even when not needed; Mike "Sputz" Krott's painful nutshot on Justin Wolf; Michael Edwards, pimp outfit and all, last eliminating Alysha Kelly with a minute left in play
Attendance
: 19, comprised of 16 men and 3 women
Familiar Faces
:
ECD
framer Dan Karen made a nice surprise visit.
Other Notes
: DODGEBALL 162 played host to the 9th Battle Royal.
Battle Royal Notes
: John Tronolone broke his own record for Battle Royal victories, now with six total. Other winners include Justin Wolf, Diana DiBuccio, Ryan Letsche, Bobby Vetrano, and four-time winner Kevin Fitzpatrick.
History
:
DODGEBALL 39
..
DODGEBALL 62
..
DODGEBALL 118
..
DODGEBALL 132
..
DODGEBALL 133
..
DODGEBALL 134
..
DODGEBALL CXL3
..
DODGEBALL CLX
________________________________________
______________
Up Next ...
It's perhaps the sport's most heated rivalry ever and it's not over just yet. Team WALL leads this race to infinity with 5 against ALL'S 3, with Round Nine looming. Catch this soon-to-be memorable encounter on November 8 beginning at 7:15!
body_html:
November '08 Inaugural Event!
Pregame Battle Royal sets the 162nd Stage!

The deadly pregame Battle Royal opened things up at DODGEBALL 162, jump-starting what should be one intense November 2008. Contestants of this 9th free-for-all included some of the modern era's finest talent: Ryan Letsche, Jon Yochum, Justin Wolf, Alysha Kelly, Kevin Fitzpatrick, Melissa Kerr, Eamon Fitzpatrick, and eventual champion John Tronolone. The ultra-competitive, big time main eventer took out Fitzpatrick brothers Kevin and runner-up Eamon to secure his record-breaking fourth Battle Royal victory.

The win rewarded Tronolone the right to form rival teams to his liking - even going as far as allowing iconic catcher "Sputz" Krott to swap coalitions each round! Plus, with "The Creation's" critical mid-season showdown against legendary performer Ryan Letsche, you can bet your *ss these two only intensified their ongoing feud.

Flash Results by Game
Team WRESTLE: 1, 5, 6
Team MANIA: 2, 3, 4, 7

All-around, it was a fun-filled evening with a plethora of athletic displays and comedic happenings. What a great way to kick-off ECD's unprecedented fourth November!

The Rules: Classic two-team match-up.
The Match: Team MANIA defeated Team WRESTLE, 4 - 3.
Moments & Stars: Justin Wolf angrily punting a bulletball into the tennis light pole; Jason Teitelbaum unintentionally smacking down a live bulletball eliminating himself in the process; Kevin Megill's obsession with hitting the rim even when not needed; Mike "Sputz" Krott's painful nutshot on Justin Wolf; Michael Edwards, pimp outfit and all, last eliminating Alysha Kelly with a minute left in play
Attendance: 19, comprised of 16 men and 3 women
Familiar Faces: ECD framer Dan Karen made a nice surprise visit.
Other Notes: DODGEBALL 162 played host to the 9th Battle Royal.
Battle Royal Notes: John Tronolone broke his own record for Battle Royal victories, now with six total. Other winners include Justin Wolf, Diana DiBuccio, Ryan Letsche, Bobby Vetrano, and four-time winner Kevin Fitzpatrick.

History: DODGEBALL 39 .. DODGEBALL 62 .. DODGEBALL 118 .. DODGEBALL 132 .. DODGEBALL 133 .. DODGEBALL 134 .. DODGEBALL CXL3 .. DODGEBALL CLX

______________________________________________________

Up Next ...

It's perhaps the sport's most heated rivalry ever and it's not over just yet. Team WALL leads this race to infinity with 5 against ALL'S 3, with Round Nine looming. Catch this soon-to-be memorable encounter on November 8 beginning at 7:15!
